scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && tslint -c tslint.json -p tsconfig.json --fix
scripts.driver:win: curl -Lo geckodriver.zip https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases/download/v0.29.1/geckodriver-v0.29.1-win64.zip && unzip -o geckodriver.zip && rm geckodriver.zip
scripts.driver:linux: curl -Lo geckodriver.tar.gz https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases/download/v0.29.1/geckodriver-v0.29.1-linux64.tar.gz && tar -xf geckodriver.tar.gz && rm geckodriver.tar.gz
